website_summaries.verdict: A comfortable feel and lightweight design are two of the benefits that buyers will gain from the Merrell Alverstone Mid Waterproof. The footgear’s rugged build and effective waterproofing also scored plus points from consumers. Its narrow fit, however, left some dissatisfied. So, although buyers can expect enough benefits from this boot, its width is not for everyone.
pros: The comfort delivered by the Merrell Alverstone Mid Waterproof has exceeded numerous buyers’ expectations
Its lightness receives tons of praise from the majority
A handful of day hikers are impressed with the ankle support of this footgear
The M Select Dry membrane lives up to its promise by keeping water out, as testified by a bunch of adventurers
According to a couple of buyers, the durability of this Merrell product is top-notch
A few wearers say that this mid-cut hiker has virtually no break-in period
cons: Several purchasers were dismayed with the narrow fit of this Merrell model

customer_reviews.title: Great fit, but didn't age well
customer_reviews.text: This is my 3rd pair of Merrells, and like the other two, these fit and wore very well. However, these began falling apart rapidly after mild-moderate use. The first thing to fail was the string stirrups near the toe box. Second was the sole begun coming undone on one shoe. Sadly I stopped wearing them. I am saddened by this due to how pleased I was with the other two pair I still currently own. Hopefully this was just an outlier, not sure if I'll repeat purchasing Merrell products.
customer_reviews.author: Ken S

customer_reviews.title: Foot bed
customer_reviews.text: So ive had these for about 2 months wear them every day to work outside constuction and they hold up really good my only complaint is inside the foot bed it has formed to my foot and in this case behind the toes it has pushed up alot so its kinda uncomfortable very noticeable when you first put them on iv never had a foot bed do this before and of course the return window has closed I thought maybe it was just this pair ? buy them again sure I would!!
customer_reviews.author: JBS

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Hiking Boots, You Will Not Be Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Bought these based on the great reviews. I was not disappointed. Great looking hiking boots, but more importantly they are extremely well made, fit perfectly, are very lightweight, support my ankle and are remarkably comfortable. I’ve put a lot of miles on these in the last few days. These may be the best hiking boots I’ve ever purchased...
customer_reviews.author: Pete Y.

customer_reviews.title: In the day I have had them, good boot.  After I replaced the short laces
customer_reviews.text: These fit well and felt good in the short time I have used them. However, I had to replace the all-too-short laces. I have average instep. I was wearing very thin black nylon gold toe socks when I tried the boot on at first. The laces were long enough to tie into a square not. But, not long enough to bow tie. The product could have gotten 'average' (3 stars) for doing as competition does. But, my last boot did not have truncated laces. So, these were below average. And, 2 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Not My Real Name

customer_reviews.title: Looks Awesome but Needs Gore-Tex
customer_reviews.text: The photos of this boot look great, and it's as good as its photos. But after wearing Vasque boots for years, which have a version of Gore-Tex and breathe well, my feet are truly baking. I might cut some subtle slits in it so my feet will survive.
customer_reviews.author: Brent Barnard

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable shoe
customer_reviews.text: Always like Merrill the shoe fits perfectly they’re always comfortable and they last for a good time. And the price was right keep up the good work. Alec
customer_reviews.author: Alec Shue

customer_reviews.title: uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: the footbed seems off kilter or another words not level to the ground when walking. Imagine your foot in a soft narrow vise with no room to feel the outsides of your sole. Very different from my other Merrills that i do wear.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Merrell makes the best shoes out there in my opinion.
customer_reviews.text: These hiking shoes are very comfortable. I use them all the time when we go out hiking around the Colorado Springs area. Bought a pair for the entire family and they love them.
customer_reviews.author: Sidronio Z. Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Fit like a glove right out of the box
customer_reviews.text: Fit like a glove right out of the box. Light, look sharp, good traction, true to size and waterproof without significant “crackle” of the waterproof layer like is common.
customer_reviews.author: R

customer_reviews.title: Comfort and fit as you would expect from Merrells!
customer_reviews.text: Have worn Merrells for quite some time now and they never disappoint! Fit and comfort right out of the box is excellent! Your foot adjusts to the shoe after the first time you wear them! Highly recommend these shoes!
customer_reviews.author: Lance F.

customer_reviews.title: Good shoes
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my employee- he says they fit great- he has skinny feet! We do physical labor 3/4 hours a day- have held up well!
customer_reviews.author: Ambrosha

customer_reviews.title: Exact fit and great shoe
customer_reviews.text: This shoe was purchased to replace my previous pair of 3 years. They are an exact fit and very comfortable shoe to wear.
customer_reviews.author: tls

customer_reviews.title: Wide feet
customer_reviews.text: The shoes fit perfectly. I Have wide feet and low arches. My feet are not cramped, and I have the much-needed arch support. Great shoes!
customer_reviews.author: Durgafamily

customer_reviews.title: Great comfort
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are so comfortable. I love wearing them and they look good too.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Narrower than most Merrells
customer_reviews.text: I have owned several pair of Merrell shoes and boots. Size 10 has always fit fine but these seem to be narrower in the fore foot. I am returning and going to try size 10 in the wide width. The 10 W fits great so I changed the rating to four stars. I haven;t worn them long enough to go any higher.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce Linenberg

customer_reviews.title: Great boots !
customer_reviews.text: Again Merrell didn't disappoint. These are probably the 7th pair I've own and still love quality.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Stevens

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Quality is poor eye lit ripped after 2 months of light use
customer_reviews.author: Terence M.

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight AND waterproof
customer_reviews.text: For those two reasons alone, I love these. Great for fishing and hiking.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney de Vries

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Received my merrell boots today. They are very comfortable perfect fit. Ordered them for a trip to colorado this month.. Will really get to test them out then..
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Mascarenas

customer_reviews.title: Great work boot for indoor and outdoor use.
customer_reviews.text: Great work boot for indoor and outdoor use. I deliver packages and these boots work great for all types of terrain.
customer_reviews.author: Phillip McCray

customer_reviews.title: Merrill outdoes themselves
customer_reviews.text: I have worn merrill for years. Yet to be let down by any of the products.
customer_reviews.author: michael Waggoner

customer_reviews.title: Best hiking/camping/hunting shoes ever.
customer_reviews.text: So i have had these shoes for a while now. Best hiking/camping/hunting shoes i have ever worn. Ive been on about 10 trips with them and i have never had a shoe with this quality. They are waterproof and amazing. Only thing ive find out is that you definitely want to double knot them with the laces they give you.
customer_reviews.author: Brad G

customer_reviews.title: Fit like a glove
customer_reviews.text: As always, Merrill’s fit like a glove out of the box! I’ve been wearing Merrill for 20 years now, and rarely purchase another brand.
customer_reviews.author: BBP

product_meta.title: Merrell mens Alverstone Mid Waterproof
product_meta.description: Enjoy every moment on the trail, in good and wet weather, when you're wearing the waterproof construction, underfoot support, and reliable grip of the Merrell® Alverstone Mid Waterproof hiking boot. Suede leather and mesh upper. Mid-profile hiking boot for added ankle protection. Waterproof M Select™ DRY impermeable membrane seals out water while letting moisture escape. Interior is treated with M Select™ FRESH antimicrobial agents that help reduce shoe odor. Bellows tongue helps keep debris out. Plush tongue and collar. Protective rubber toe cap guards against rocks and trail debris. Traditional lace-up system for a secure fit. Heel pull tab. Breathable mesh lining. Removable Kinetic Fit™ BASE contoured insole provides flexible support and underfoot comfort. Compression-molded EVA midsole for stability and comfort. Merrell air cushion in the heel absorbs impacting shock. Molded nylon arch shank. M Select™ GRIP outsole provides durable traction on a variety of surfaces. 5mm lug depth. Imported. Measurements: Weight: 1 lb 2 oz Shaft: 4 1⁄2 in Product measurements were taken using size 12, width M. Please note that measurements may vary by size. Weight of footwear is based on a single item, not a pair.
feature_bullets: Merrell Air Cushion in the heel absorbs shock and adds stability
Merrell Kinetic Fit BASE removable contoured footbed for flexible support
